FROM gcr.io/oss-fuzz-base/base-builder
RUN apt-get update && apt-get install --no-install-recommends -y libpcre2-dev libssl-dev libsystemd-dev autoconf libtool && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;
RUN git clone https://github.com/wazuh/wazuh

WORKDIR $SRC/wazuh
COPY build.sh $SRC/
COPY fuzz_xml.c $SRC/fuzz_xml.c
